articles.description: The merger of Tech Mahindra's three companies and the shareholders of each has been approved by the board of directors. The company's September quarter earnings were released concurrently with this statement.
articles.content:
Tech Mahindra's director board approved the merger by absorption of three of the company's subsidiaries and their shareholders, the firm said in an exchange filing on October 25.
The company release… [+1915 chars]
